subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Tonalist won the 146th running of the Belmont Stakes on Saturday, denying California Chrome his shot at becoming the first Triple Crown winner since Affirmed in 1978.
snippet: Tonalist won the 146th running of the Belmont Stakes on Saturday, denying California Chrome his shot at becoming the first Triple Crown winner since Affirmed in 1978.
